description: I.M. Somapala Vs. I.M. Thiiakarathne & others - Hon. A.H.M.D. Nawaz, J - Scheme inquiry to determine which scheme to be accepted Interim order under section 36(1) of Partition Law not appealable before One cannot slay phantom dragons
